traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a Tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

traits.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.description: If the boar takes 7 damage or fewer that would reduce it to 0 HP, it is reduced to 1 HP instead.
